H

handle(ActionEvent) - Method in class GUIEngine.exitButtonGUI
A function that serialises the GameState to handle unexpected exits and mid-game exits
handle(ActionEvent) - Method in class GUIEngine.homeButtonGUI
A function that shows a PopOver if the same Color is chosen for different players and does not allow the exit of the page in that case
handle(ActionEvent) - Method in class GUIEngine.instructionsButtonGUI
A function that displays the instructions for playing the game by showing a PopOver with the text
handle(ActionEvent) - Method in class GUIEngine.restartButtonGUI
A function that takes the ArrayList of Player from the GameEngine and refreshes it by setting every player as alive and not killable and not active.
handle(ActionEvent) - Method in class GUIEngine.resumeButtonGUI
A function that allows resuming the game from an unexpected exit or a mid-game exit by restoring the last state of the game by deserialising the GameState object.
handle(ActionEvent) - Method in class GUIEngine.settingsButtonGUI
A function that reads the _gridSize and _numPlayers from the ComboBox present in the home page and generates _numPlayers number of active ColorPicker objects.
handle(ActionEvent) - Method in class GUIEngine.startButtonGUI
A function that starts the game.
handle(MouseEvent) - Method in class GUIEngine.turnGUI
This function handles each and every turn for the game, in GUI.
handle(ActionEvent) - Method in class GUIEngine.undoButtonGUI
A function that restores the state of the last move in the game by deserialising the GameState object.
handleAnimation(int, int, GridPane) - Method in class GUIEngine.turnGUI
This method handles the explosion animation in the game.
handleGame() - Method in class GameEngine.GameController
Handler function for the taketurn(x, y) function.
handleTurn(int, int, GridPane) - Method in class GUIEngine.turnGUI
This method handles the manipulation of spheres in the clicked StackPane.
homeButton - Static variable in class GUIEngine.GUIMain
 
homeButtonGUI - Class in GUIEngine
An EventHandler class associated with the Home button in the Settings page
